{{Infobox Book | name = Ubuntu Hacks | image = | author = [[Kyle Rankin (author)|Kyle Rankin]]
[[Jonathan Oxer]]
[[Bill Childers]] | country = {{Flagicon|USA}} [[United States]] | language = [[English language|English]] | series = [[O'Reilly_Media#Hacks|Hacks]] | publisher = [[O'Reilly Media]] | pub_date = June 2006 | pages = 447 | isbn = ISBN 0-596-52720-9 }} '''''Ubuntu Hacks: Tips & Tools for Exploring, Using, and Tuning Linux''''' is a book of tips about [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]], a popular [[Linux]] distribution. The book was published by [[O'Reilly Media]] in June 2006 as part of the O'Reilly Hacks series. == Editions == * First edition (2006; 447 pages; ISBN 0-596-52720-9) == External links == *[http://www.oreilly.com/catalog/9780596527204/ O'Reilly Online catalog: Ubuntu Hacks] *[http://books.slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=06/06/21/1437206 Slashdot review] [[Category:2006 books]] [[Category:O'Reilly Media books]] {{compu-book-stub}}
